name: life-reset
description: A personal wellness app to help you track daily progress, manage your mood, and journal your journey.

scripts.build: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && mkdir -p www/icons && cp index.html www/ && cp -r css www/ && cp -r js www/ && cp firebase-config.js www/ && cp manifest.webmanifest www/ && cp sw.js www/ && cp -r icons www/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android: npm run sync && npx cap open android
scripts.android:run: npm run sync && npx cap run android
scripts.android:build: npm run sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:release: npm run sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
